summary:
I love to dig into customer problems and solve them with modern technology. I focus on delivering key outcomes, efficiently collaborating with teammates and other teams and quickly adapting to new learnings.   Being born in an entrepreneurs family, I started my journey in marketing when I was 14 years old. Since then, I have enjoyed many opportunities throughout my career in marketing and I recently moved to tech product management (product ownership) . My personal and professional experiences have taught me the following about myself:  - I put the customer at the center of all that I do. - I excel at the execution of big ideas with given constraints - My gut instinct is good but I seek data for my decisions - I’m constantly learning because I never settle - I stay calm when faced with adversity  I enjoy meeting new people and hearing new perspectives. Reach out if you want to talk to me about product, loyalty programs, e-commerce or Ukraine 🇺🇦 my homeland. #supportukraine

projects.title: Online Marketing Integrated Project Assignment
projects.description:
The purpose of this report is to investigate the online marketing performance of the
Forever21 webshop in order to determine possible weaknesses and thus advise
opportunities for improvement. The fashion retailer Forever21 was established in 1984 and operates more than 600 stores worldwide. The company merchandises women's, men's and kids clothing as well as accessories. Furthermore, it is known for offering the latest fashion trends at an affordable
price to their customers.
This advisory report consists of various topics such as the business model canvas, co-
creation, social media as well as search engine optimization and search engine advertising.
Moreover, an analysis was conducted in order to formulate a final conclusion and
recommendation.

projects.title: Integrated Project Assignment: Start-up "Printsy"
projects.description:
On June the 13th, for an Integrated Project Assignment of the International Marketing & Management programme in the Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen I, together with a few fellow students, set up a company to sell a product on the Hanze Fair. 
Our company was called "Printsy", and we tried to execute the assignment as realistic and professional as possible: we set up an action plan on the basis of researched market opportunities; implemented the required marketing communication and sales activities in a methodical way in accordance with the PDCA cycle, completed Business Model Canvas.

"Printsy" sold art in three different forms: T-shirts, stickers and customized shopping bags made by Minerva Academy students. For the shopping bags we specially invited graduating graphical designer Kevin Rooi. The customer could put up requests with Kevin, and Kevin would translate the request to a design on the bag. In just four hours we sold 18 t-shirts, 26 stickers, and 13 bags. In my opinion, this was a great result and I am proud of my team for achieving this. 
Throughout this project, I felt that especially my communicational skills were challenged, but I also feel like I improved them very much. I guess we learn best through trial and error.

projects.title: Integrated Project Assignment: German Beer Market Research
projects.description:
From its storied past to vibrant present and innovative future, beer and Germany are inseparable. Experience the culture and traditions that surround the brew that Germans consider as a national treasure. 
Within this report, we will try to answer our key question “In which way is it going to be most beneficial to invest in the German beer market?” and sub-questions: 
- Is there a niche in the German beer market which is not saturated?
- On which target group should we focus on? 

To be able to answer these questions, we analysed the external environment of the beer market, which consists of the macro- and the meso-environment and launched an online survey.
					
First of all, we based our macro-analysis on the DESTEP aspects. This aspects examines demographic, economic, social-cultural, technological, environmental, political influences on our business.
	
Secondly, the Meso environment consists of those factors a business can exert only a small influence on. It also comprises all those organisations or groups a firm will be affected by and have relationships with. Moreover, from the meso-environment, come opportunities and threats. To analyse the meso-environment, the beer market has to be examined by taking a close look at the market type with the entry barriers, the estimated market and its estimated growth. Furthermore, the product’s nature, the demand features, the suppliers and the main players with their strengths and weaknesses.
	
To collect primary data, we released an online survey. This was considered as the best way of getting direct feedback from clearly defined target groups and it allows us to ask precise questions to a very specific group of people. This type of research helps to develop new marketing and customer profiling/ engagement strategies, identify our target group.

profile_positions.title: Junior Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
Product Strategy & Delivery
 • Contributing to the optimization of the product’s value for the consumer and the company (ROI).
• Monitoring product delivery in line with the roadmap and committed delivery dates. Raising delivery issues on-time.
• Supporting the specification of user stories where required.
 Stakeholder management
 • Communicate with stakeholders regarding the product, its features, etc.
 Backlog Management
 • Contribute to prioritizing the items in the product backlog. Specify the definition-of-done for backlog items in cooperation with the Product Owner and the product team.
• Support the refinement of the product backlog in collaboration with the (Sr.) Product Owner to ensure that the product team is delivering the right enhancements to drive consumer and business value.
 Monitoring
 • Monitor, optimize and enhance the configuration, features and functionalities related to the product.
• Use data sources and feedback loops to help the team to focus on the right enhancements.
 Potential projects
 • Supporting and driving Invite a Friend roll-out across both brands for existing touchpoints in close alignment with Market and global stakeholders
• Managing referral program and identify new opportunities for Invite a friend feature including briefing with UX, Research, Solution Design, Stakeholder alignment
• Prioritized Contextual Enrichment consumer journeys: UX, Research, Solution Design, Stakeholder alignment
• Gamification of existing signup touchpoints: UX, Research, Solution Design, Stakeholder alignment
• Best practice guide: review and create an acquisition best practice guide with other stakeholders

volunteer_experiences.description:
We are a group of international students and alumni in Groningen, working together on different initiatives to help Ukraine and Ukrainians through this horrific war. We organize local fundraising events, demonstrations and aid collection. 
We work with the foundation 'Ukrainians in the Netherlands', Groningen Municipality, International Welcome Center in the North and many other organisations.
The International Committee is organizing formal and informal activities aimed at internationals within the association and the International Marketing & Management faculty.

Ukrainian Students Association of Groningen was created to help each other with troubles, answer questions and share the experience of studying abroad. 
Moreover, it is a great opportunity to broad a network and to find new friends.
We occasionally have informal meetings in bars to meet new members, get to know each other better and enjoy our time together or trips to Ukrainian conferences/concerts/fairs.

I was volunteering at the animals shelter by providing care, cleaning, and socializing with dogs and cats through different activities. 
http://animals.kharkov.ua/shelter_pets

Surprisingly, there are currently no sophisticated playlists with Ukrainian music on any music streaming platform. As the total number of music streaming subscribers reached 400 million in 2020, these are the leading platforms for music promotion and performers. Therefore, our project is focused on solving this problem: the creation of exclusively Ukrainian playlists.

We are a team of volunteers who have the necessary skills to promote Ukrainian music by creating well-composed, sophisticated playlists. I'm a team lead in this project and responsible for all the documentation, organisation. I'm also taking care of promoting our project and playlists by sharing it to relevant social channels and groups and applying for grants.

https://www.ukrainians.nl/language/en/
